object.name: SN_RESOURCE_COUNTER_FOOD
object.tooltip: Food, plus some word-wrapping: Material, usually of plant or animal origin, that contains or consists of essential body nutrients, such as carbohydrates, fats, proteins, vitamins, or minerals, and is ingested and assimilated by an organism to produce energy, stimulate growth, and maintain life.

object.name: SESSION_GROUP_PANE_PORTRAIT_52_BAR
SN_STATUS_PANE_PORTRAIT
object.action: setCameraTarget(selection[0].position); // Focus the camera on the unit when his portrait is clicked.
